title: Studio Anmut
description: Anmut is an architectural studio based in Padang, established in 2024. The studio specializes in architecture, design, and teaching, striving for a timeless and sensitive approach that accommodates various activities while balancing economic and design considerations. 'Anmut' means exquisite beauty in German.

title: Sawala Tech
description: Sawala Tech is a technology company dedicated to developing cutting-edge software and hardware solutions for diverse industries. Our team consists of seasoned professionals committed to delivering the best technological solutions to meet the needs of our clients.

title: Asian Society Gynecologic Oncology (ASGO) 2024
description: The 2024 Asian Society of Gynecologic Oncology (ASGO) Annual Meeting, themed “Innovative Strategies in Gynecologic Oncology: From Bench to Bedside,” will be held from April 5th to 7th at the Bali International Convention Center (BICC) in Bali, Indonesia.

title: Rumah Imperium
description: Rumah Imperium is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing education and support for children with special needs. We believe that every child deserves a quality education, regardless of their abilities. Our mission is to create a safe, nurturing environment where children can learn and develop to their fullest potential.
